verbose_text: This observation suggests that formation of a dsRNA duplex between the antisense sRNA and the 5 ' region of the mRNA target may trigger destabilization of the mRNA; or alternatively, that base pairing between the antisense sRNA and the 5 ' end of the nascent mRNA early in elongation may trigger premature transcription termination.
evidence: base pairing between the antisense sRNA and the 5' end of the nascent mRNA early in elongation may trigger premature transcription
